textBanner: Start your career in the technology and creative industries. It's never too late to learn and dream
itSolutionsText1: Start your career in engineering: front-end, back-end or iOS development.
itSolutionsText2: You can order a website, an application, or order design from us!
marketingText1: Creative industries are industries that rely on individual creativity, skills and talents, or have the potential to create wealth and jobs through the development or production of intellectual property.
marketingText2: Visual effects, 3D design, Drone pilot, SMM, UX/UI design, Mobilography
coursesText1: We believe that working on real-life projects can simulate real life, so students can adapt faster and apply skills right away.
coursesText2: Students and mentors can attend meetings, network, hone their social skills, and more.
coursesTitle3: The best students undergo internships with us and our partners
coursesText3: We teach because we need these specialists. So we would like to hire the best students if possible
aboutUsText: Our mission at the School of Creative Professions is to give people the opportunity to unleash their creativity potential and develop a passionate career in an ongoing
coursesText: Unleash your creativity and reach your potential with our variety of courses designed to develop your artistic skills and professional experience.
portfolioText1: Our portfolio showcases the exceptional talent and creativity of our students, mentors and alumni in a variety of fields including design, film, animation and software development for web and mobile applications.
portfolioText2: Browse our collection of inspiring works and discover how our education and mentoring programs have helped our graduates make significant contributions in their chosen industries.
ourPartnersText: We are trusted by companies all over the world and used by millions of users
eventsText: Stay up to date with our events and course launches
cooperationTitle: We are always open to cooperation
cooperationText1: “If I saw further than others, it was because I stood on the shoulders of giants.”
cooperationText2: Let's learn together, grow together and earn together. If you would like to hire our students and mentors, please contact us
mission: Our mission at Schools of Creative Arts is to empower people to discover their creative potential and develop passionate careers in an ongoing
